# Exclamation mark

Should not be placed here!  
Backslashed should be preserved \\!  
Even in `code ! \! \\! \!!`

# Hash

Issue number #123, #2; and #3. LOL:#5  
#123 is a good issue.  
&\#13; is a xml entity.

1.  123 is not an issue.
